main.description: Official Reveal website - Disease surveillance and outbreak response platform

ProductOverview.Summary: Reveal is an open-source disease surveillance and outbreak response platform designed to support public health surveillance and response activities.
ProductOverview.Description: Reveal provides tools for case detection, investigation, contact tracing, and outbreak management. It supports real-time data collection, analysis, and reporting to enable rapid response to public health threats and disease outbreaks.
ProductOverview.PrimaryFunctionality: Disease surveillance and outbreak response platform with case management
ProductOverview.Users: Public health officials, epidemiologists, disease surveillance teams, and outbreak response coordinators

Reach.SummaryOfReach: Reveal has been implemented in various public health settings to support disease surveillance and outbreak response activities.

Maturity.SummaryOfMaturity: All maturity model assessments are self-reported by the funded organization leading the development of the global good.

Community.DescriptionOfCommunity: Reveal is developed and maintained by a global community focused on disease surveillance and public health response.

HostAnchorOrganization.name: Reveal
HostAnchorOrganization.description: Open source disease surveillance and outbreak response platform

Sustainability.Description: Reveal is supported through open source development and community contributions.
